titles.title: Essential Workers for Economic Advancement Act
Essential Workers for Economic Advancement Act
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for an H-2C nonimmigrant classification, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
